original: Klingström, Åke Waldemar, kapten, Ronneby, f. 10/6/11 i Esllöv av järnv:-tj :m. Au g. Oihlssion o. Selma Öhlin. G. 44 m. Ulla-Brita Ungerth. Barn: Björn f. 46. — Realex. 28, avg:ex. v. Malmö handelisgymn. 32, reservoff :ex. 33. Anst. v. polisverket i Malmö 33-40, i intend :kårenis res. 34-40, löjtn. på aktiv stat 40, kapt. i intend :befattn. v. flygv. 42, flottiljintend. v. Blek. flygflottilj sed. 44. Luftskyddsstud. som Malmö stads stip. i Berlin 38.
translated: Klingström, Åke Waldemar, captain, Ronneby, born 10/6/11 in Esllöv. Son of a railway official, August Klingström, and Oihlssion (maiden name) Öhlin. Married in 1944 to Ulla-Brita Ungerth. Children: Björn, born in 1946. Attended Realexamen in 1928, graduated from Malmö Commercial College in 1932. Commissioned officer in the reserve in 1933. Employed at the Malmö Police Department from 1933-1940, in the reserve of the Intendant Corps from 1934-1940. Promoted to lieutenant in the active service in 1940, captain in the Intendant Department at the Air Force Garrison in 1942, and Intendant of the Blekinge Air Wing from 1944. Studied air defense as a scholarship recipient of the City of Malmö in Berlin in 1938.
